name: Davidoff - Special Series - Short Perfecto
additionalNotes: Davidoff Short Perfecto Cigars are hand made in the Dominican Republic with a complex blending of excellent tobaccos from up to four different harvests. The Davidoff Special Series is medium in strength; however the Double R lends itself towards the full-bodied range. Davidoff Special Series are the most popular of the Davidoff line of cigars.
